Detailed Description

template<typename VarArray, typename VarSum, int VarToCount = 1, BOOL is_reversed = false>
struct BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic< VarArray, VarSum, VarToCount, is_reversed >

constraints;watchsumgeq Description The constraint watchsumgeq(vec, c) ensures that sum(vec) >= c. constraints;watchsumgeq Notes For this constraint, small values of c are more efficient.

Equivalent to litsumgeq(vec, [1,...,1], c), but faster.

This constraint works on 0/1 variables only. constraints;watchsumgeq Reifiability This constraint is not reifiable. constraints;watchsumgeq References See also

help constraints watchsumleq help constraints litsumgeq constraints;watchsumleq Description The constraint watchsumleq(vec, c) ensures that sum(vec) <= c. constraints;watchsumleq Notes Equivalent to litsumgeq([vec1,...,vecn], [0,...,0], n-c) but faster.

This constraint works on binary variables only.

For this constraint, large values of c are more efficient. constraints;watchsumleq References See also

help constraints watchsumgeq help constraints litsumgeq

int BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic< VarArray, VarSum, VarToCount, is_reversed >::dynamic_trigger_count (  )  [inline, virtual]

Defines the number of dynamic triggers the constraint wants. Must be implemented by any constraint.

template<typename VarArray, typename VarSum, int VarToCount = 1, BOOL is_reversed = false>
virtual bool BoolLessSumConstraintDynamic< VarArray, VarSum, VarToCount, is_reversed >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
